page.title: 03KIRKBY UNDERWOOD continued
page.content:
There are no shops in the village although some of the inhabitants do offer fresh garden produce for sale from the "garden gate" and mobile grocery, butcher, baker, fish and fruit and vegetable vans visit each week. Likewise, there is a normal delivery and collection of mail, a morning delivery of newspapers and the milkman calls five days a week.
The major employer of the area exclud- ing farm and agricultural workers is that of Nelson Green and Son who specialize in agricultural machinery and operate from a large complex in the centre of the village.
